fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Complete Member Journey Timeline
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to create a comprehensive timeline across multiple entities showing all activities for a specific member.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me a complete activity timeline for member 'Sarah Johnson' including all memberships, events attended, courses completed, chapters joined, and committees served on. Present as a chronological timeline chart. When I click on any activity, show me the specific details in a panel or table. From there, let me open the actual record for that activity.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes timeline visualization spanning all activity types
Timeline is chronologically ordered with clear date markers
Clicking activity shows detailed information panel or table
Detail view includes all relevant activity metadata
Links allow opening the actual records in the system
